trans-unit.source: Returns data from a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached"></xref> event.
`RecognizerUpdateReached` events provide a mechanism for pausing a speech recognition engine to apply atomic and synchronous modifications, such as loading and unloading grammars.
trans-unit.target: `RecognizerUpdateReached`事件會提供暫停套用不可部分完成和同步的修改，例如載入與卸載文法的語音辨識引擎的機制。

trans-unit.source: If your application is using a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance to manage recognition, it can use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods to request that the engine pauses to receive an update.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>管理辨識執行個體，它可以使用其中一種<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>要求引擎暫停接收更新的方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance raises a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=fullName> event when it is ready for the update.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>執行個體引發<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=fullName>準備好更新時的事件。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: While a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance is paused, you can load, unload, enable, and disable <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects, and modify values for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 雖然<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>執行個體已暫停，您可以載入、 卸載、 啟用和停用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>物件，並修改值<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: If your application is using a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> instance to manage recognition, it can use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods to request that the engine pauses to receive an update.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>管理辨識執行個體，它可以使用其中一種<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>要求引擎暫停接收更新的方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> instance raises a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=fullName> event when it is ready for the update.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>執行個體引發<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=fullName>準備好更新時的事件。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: While a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> instance is paused, you can load, unload, enable, and disable <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: 雖然<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>執行個體已暫停，您可以載入、 卸載、 啟用和停用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>物件。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: When handling <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=fullName> events, a recognition engine pauses until the event handler returns.
trans-unit.target: 當處理<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=fullName>事件，辨識引擎暫停，直到傳回事件處理常式。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Gets the audio position associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 取得與事件相關聯的音訊位置。

trans-unit.source: Applications can use the location indicated by AudioPosition to access audio input that occurred while the recognition engine was paused.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式可用於 AudioPosition 所表示之位置的存取時發生辨識引擎已暫停的音訊輸入。

trans-unit.source: Returns the location within the speech buffer of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> when it pauses and raises a `RecognizerUpdateReached` event.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的語音緩衝區內的位置<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref>或<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>當它暫停，並引發`RecognizerUpdateReached`事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the `UserToken` passed to the system when an application calls <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate*> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate*>.
trans-unit.target: 取得`UserToken`傳遞到系統中，當應用程式呼叫<> *> 或<> *>。

trans-unit.source: An application specifies a `UserToken` when it requests the generation of a `RecognizerUpdateReached` event by calling one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods that take a `userToken` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式指定`UserToken`它會要求產生`RecognizerUpdateReached`透過呼叫其中一個事件<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法會採用`userToken`參數。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Returns an object that contains the `UserToken`.
